name: ProPresenter 6 Document
summary: A PRO6 file contains a presentation created with ProPresenter 6, which is a program used for assembling productions for sporting events, church worship services, and conferences. It stores information about a presentation, which includes the number of slides, the layout of each slide, and transitions and timing between slides. PRO6 files also contain references to audio or video in the presentation.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PRO6 file open in Renewed Vision ProPresenter 6
images.alt: PRO6 file open in Renewed Vision ProPresenter 6
